item.title: About me
item.author: Author
item.description: Me in 10 bullet points or so 3 jobs love my wife and be a dad of two childs. contributor to open source projects learning, REALLY, a LOT OF THINGS by contributing to curl site reliability engineer as a paid job I try to be humble, everyone is trying no? currently , living in France… love to be out of my comfort zone
